message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to work with you. After careful consideration, we're willing to offer you the product for $900000. We believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, we're willing to offer you the product for $850000. We believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort in adjusting the price. I would like to counter with an offer of $800000 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. We're willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $825000. We're getting close to a deal, and we're eager to finalize the agreement.
